text: Julen Kerman Madariaga Agirre (11 October 1932 â€“ 6 April 2021) was a Spanish Basque politician and lawyer who co-founded the Basque armed group ETA in 1959. In June 2006, he was arrested in France on charges of extorting businessmen into making financial contributions to ETA. However, the charges were dropped and he was released within days. He died on 6 April 2021 at the age of 88 from a long illness. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish lawyers
title: Julen Madariaga
